计软智网转专业试题回忆版、模拟题及参考解答
  • 网安 2023 年试题
  • 3. 编写程序题 (30 分)
  • 1. 动态数组, 矩阵 (10 分)
  • 查看页面源码

1. 动态数组, 矩阵 (10 分)

输入一个数 m, 完成两个函数 fill() 和 print(), 使得程序运行结果如下所示.

main.cpp
 1#include <cstring>
 2#include <iostream>
 3#include <string>
 4
 5using namespace std;
 6
 7int main() {
 8  int m;
 9  cin >> m;
10  int num[5][5] = {};
11  char ch[5][5] = {};
12  fill(num, ch, m);
13  print(num, ch, m);
14  return 0;
15}

 1输入: 4
 2输出:
 31   2   3   4
 412  13  14  5
 511  16  15  6
 610  9   8   7
 7a   b   c   d
 8l   m   n   e
 9k   p   o   f
10j   i   h   g

点击查看解答参考

[在线代码 srE68Yx88]

 1#include <cstring>
 2#include <iostream>
 3#include <string>
 4
 5using namespace std;
 6
 7template <typename T>
 8void fill_impl(T (*array)[5], int order, int offset) {
 9  int i     = 0;
10  int j     = 0;
11  int count = 0;
12  while (true) {
13    for (; j < order && array[i][j] == 0; ++j) {
14      array[i][j] = offset + count;
15      ++count;
16    }
17    if (count == order * order) {
18      break;
19    }
20    ++i;
21    --j;
22
23    for (; i < order && array[i][j] == 0; ++i) {
24      array[i][j] = offset + count;
25      ++count;
26    }
27    if (count == order * order) {
28      break;
29    }
30    --i;
31    --j;
32
33    for (; j > -1 && array[i][j] == 0; --j) {
34      array[i][j] = offset + count;
35      ++count;
36    }
37    if (count == order * order) {
38      break;
39    }
40    --i;
41    ++j;
42
43    for (; i > -1 && array[i][j] == 0; --i) {
44      array[i][j] = offset + count;
45      ++count;
46    }
47    if (count == order * order) {
48      break;
49    }
50    ++i;
51    ++j;
52  }
53}
54
55void fill(int (*num)[5], char (*ch)[5], int m) {
56  fill_impl(num, m, 1);
57  fill_impl(ch, m, 'a');
58}
59
60template <typename T>
61void print_impl(T (*array)[5], int order) {
62  for (int i = 0; i < order; ++i) {
63    for (int j = 0; j < order; ++j) {
64      std::cout << array[i][j] << '\t';
65    }
66    std::cout << '\n';
67  }
68}
69
70void print(int (*num)[5], char (*ch)[5], int m) {
71  print_impl(num, m);
72  print_impl(ch, m);
73}
74
75int main() {
76  int m;
77  cin >> m;
78  int num[5][5] = {};
79  char ch[5][5] = {};
80  fill(num, ch, m);
81  print(num, ch, m);
82  return 0;
83}
